member.name: M:PetaPoco.Extensions.DatabaseExtensions.Query``1(PetaPoco.IDatabase,SqlKata.Query)
member.summary: Runs an SQL query, returning the results as an IEnumerable collection
member.typeparam: The Type representing a row in the result set
member.param: A SqlKata representing the base SQL query and its arguments
member.returns: An enumerable collection of result records
member.remarks: For some DB providers, care should be taken to not start a new Query before finishing with and disposing the previous one. In cases where this is an issue, consider using Fetch which returns the results as a List rather than an IEnumerable.

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Extensions.DatabaseExtensions.Fetch``1(PetaPoco.IDatabase,SqlKata.Query)
member.summary: Runs a query and returns the result set as a typed list
member.typeparam: The Type representing a row in the result set
member.param: A SqlKata representing the query and its arguments
member.returns: A List holding the results of the query

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Extensions.DatabaseExtensions.First``1(PetaPoco.IDatabase,SqlKata.Query)
member.summary: Runs a query that should always return at least one row
member.typeparam: The Type representing a row in the result set
member.param: A SqlKata representing the query and its arguments
member.returns: The first record in the result set

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Extensions.DatabaseExtensions.FirstOrDefault``1(PetaPoco.IDatabase,SqlKata.Query)
member.summary: Runs a query and returns the first record, or the default value if no matching records
member.typeparam: The Type representing a row in the result set
member.param: A SqlKata representing the query and its arguments
member.returns: The first record in the result set, or default(T) if no matching records

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Extensions.DatabaseExtensions.Execute(PetaPoco.IDatabase,SqlKata.Query)
member.summary: Executes a non-query command
member.param: A SqlKata representing the query and its arguments
member.returns: The number of rows affected

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Extensions.DatabaseExtensions.ExecuteScalar``1(PetaPoco.IDatabase,SqlKata.Query)
member.summary: Executes a query and return the first column of the first row in the result set.
member.typeparam: The type that the result value should be cast to
member.param: A SqlKata representing the query and its arguments
member.returns: The scalar value cast to T

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Extensions.DatabaseExtensions.Page``1(PetaPoco.IDatabase,System.Int64,System.Int64,SqlKata.Query)
member.summary: Retrieves a range of records from result set
member.typeparam: The Type representing a row in the result set
member.param: A SqlKata representing the base SQL query and its arguments
member.returns: A List of results
member.remarks: PetaPoco will automatically modify the supplied SELECT statement to only retrieve the records for the specified range.

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Extensions.DatabaseExtensions.SkipTake``1(PetaPoco.IDatabase,System.Int64,System.Int64,SqlKata.Query)
member.summary: Retrieves a range of records from result set
member.typeparam: The Type representing a row in the result set
member.param: The number of rows at the start of the result set to skip over
The number of rows to retrieve
A SqlKata representing the base SQL query and its arguments
member.returns: A List of results
member.remarks: PetaPoco will automatically modify the supplied SELECT statement to only retrieve the records for the specified range.

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Extensions.DatabaseExtensions.QueryMultiple(PetaPoco.IDatabase,SqlKata.Query)
member.summary: Perform a multi-results set query
member.param: A SqlKata representing the base SQL query and its arguments
member.returns: A GridReader to be queried
